text: Richard McKirahan is an American philosopher and Edwin Clarence Norton Professor of Classics and Professor of Philosophy at Pomona College. He is known for his works on Pre-Socratics. ==Books== * Philosophy Before Socrates (1994) * A PreSocratics Reader (1996) * Principles and Proofs: Aristotle's Theory of Demonstrative Species (1992) ==References== Category:20th-century American philosophers Category:21st-century American philosophers Category:Philosophy academics Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pomona College faculty Category:American scholars of ancient Greek philosophy Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Richard McKirahan
